block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 组合多个短曲按顺序播放 combine multiple short tunes to play in sequence
显示曲调的音符 show the notes of the tunes
演奏多首曲子 play the multiple tunes
